description: Desktop Commander onboarding prompts - V2 simplified (5 prompts only)

prompts.title: Organize my Downloads folder
prompts.description: Clean up and organize your messy Downloads folder into relevant subfolders automatically.
prompts.prompt:
Let's organize your Downloads folder! 

First, let me check what we're working with. I'll look at your Downloads folder to see how many files are there and what types.

Should I start by analyzing your Downloads folder?
prompts.author: DC team

prompts.title: Explain codebase or repository to me
prompts.description: Analyze and explain any codebase - local project or GitHub repository - including architecture, dependencies, and how it works.
prompts.prompt:
I'll analyze and explain any codebase for you! üîç

**What should I analyze?**

*Local project:* `~/work/my-project` (replace with your path)
*GitHub repo:* `https://github.com/user/repo`

I'll break down the architecture, dependencies, and how everything works together!
prompts.author: DC team

prompts.title: Create organized knowledge/documents folder
prompts.description: Set up a well-structured knowledge base or document organization system with templates and suggested categories.
prompts.prompt:
Let's create an organized knowledge base! üìö

**Where should I set it up?**

*I suggest: `~/Documents/Knowledge-Base` (replace with your path) or give me a different location.*

I'll create a clean folder structure with templates and organize any existing documents you have!
prompts.author: DC team

prompts.title: Analyze my data file
prompts.description: Upload or point to any data file (CSV, JSON, Excel, etc.) and get comprehensive analysis including patterns, insights, and summary reports.
prompts.prompt:
I'll help you analyze your data file! 

What's the path to your data file? (e.g., `/Users/yourname/data.csv`)

Once you give me the path, I'll start by checking what type of file it is and show you a quick preview, then we can dive deeper step by step.
prompts.author: DC team

prompts.title: Check system health and resources
prompts.description: Analyze your system's health, resource usage, running processes, and generate a comprehensive system status report.
prompts.prompt:
Let me check your system health and resources!

I'll start by looking at your CPU, memory, and disk usage, then check for any performance issues.

Should I begin the system analysis?
prompts.author: DC team
